mapper.select: SELECT cus.*,(SELECT ctname FROM customertype WHERE customertype.ctno=cus.`ctno`) AS ctname ,(SELECT personnelname FROM `personnel` WHERE personnel.`personnelid`=cus.`personnelid`) AS personnelname ,vip.`vno`,vip.`vjoindate`,vip.`venddate`,vip.`currentjifen`,vip.`money` FROM customer cus LEFT JOIN vip ON vip.`cno`=cus.`cno` WHERE cus.`cno`=#{cno}

SELECT cus.*,(SELECT ctname FROM customertype WHERE customertype.ctno=cus.`ctno`) AS ctname ,(SELECT personnelname FROM `personnel` WHERE personnel.`personnelid`=cus.`personnelid`) AS personnelname ,vip.`vno`,vip.`vjoindate`,vip.`venddate`,vip.`currentjifen`,vip.`money` FROM customer cus LEFT JOIN vip ON vip.`cno`=cus.`cno`
mapper.sql: cno, ctno, cname, cpeople, cphone, caddress, cbirthday, cperiod, climit, personnelid, cadviserphone, cprovince, cremark, ctaxes, cregistphone, cbank, cbanknumber, cdlicense, cregistaddress, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from customer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into customer (cno, ctno, cname, cpeople, cphone, caddress, cbirthday, cperiod, climit, personnelid, cadviserphone, cprovince, cremark, ctaxes, cregistphone, cbank, cbanknumber, cdlicense, cregistaddress, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5 ) values (#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cperiod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{climit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{personnelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cadviserphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctaxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cregistphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cregistaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
